verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I was <S%H8056>glad<s%> when they <S%H559>said<s%> to me, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

<S%H8033>Where<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up, the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H3050>LORD,<s%> to the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
For <S%H8033>there<s%> are <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> the <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>
<S%H7592>Pray<s%> for the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> they shall <S%H7951>prosper<s%> that <S%H157>love<s%> you.
<S%H7965>Peace<s%> be within your <S%H2426>walls,<s%> and <S%H7962>prosperity<s%> within your <S%H759>palaces.<s%>
For my <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H7453>companions'<s%> <S%H4616>sakes,<s%> I will <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H1696>say,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be within you.
<S%H4616>Because<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H2896>good.<s%>
